name: Infoblox Integration Template
description: This template gets and returns an IP address from Infoblox via camc_scriptpackage

metadata.longDescription: This template gets and returns an IP address from Infoblox via camc_scriptpackage

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: N/A, Execution occurs on the CAM engine

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: N/A This script is run locally on the terraform server.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The Infoblox Integration module, with an output of assigned_ip_address, can be composed with other Terraform configurations which require an IP address as input.
2. A functional and reachable Infoblox service is required prior to running this template.
3. On deletion, this template will release the IP Address from the Infoblox pool.
